original_text: It shone with the glory of God, and its brilliance was like that of a very precious jewel, like a jasper, clear as crystal.
korean_text: 하나님의 영광이 있어 그 성의 빛이 지극히 귀한 보석 같고 벽옥과 수정 같이 맑더라

sentences.original_text: It shone with the glory of God
and its brilliance was like that of a very precious jewel
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 빛은 매우 귀한 보석과 같았습니다
